ygData.subject: RE: Patch day is this wednesday!
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed when I put a mace in my off-hand attack stays at hand to hand levels.  When I put a mace in my main hand, attack drops to 1hb level. I ve used
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed when I put a mace in my off-hand attack stays at hand to hand
levels. When I put a mace in my main hand, attack drops to 1hb level.

I've used that as a good way to increase 1hb without losing my primary
attack (mace in off-hand) I think that attack rating is just an indicator
of what you have (or don't have) in your primary hand. When using a mace, I
haven't noticed my attack speed go up at hand to hand, or the mace hasn't
dropped to hand to hand speed.

-----Original Message-----
From: Lombard.Mikhael [mailto:Mikhael_Lombard@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 11:47 AM
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Patch day is this wednesday!


From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>

I also have another question, I have noticed that when I equip one Black
enameled mace Dly 27 and leave my other hand empty that my atk still stays
at 1006 with a Storm Strength, but when I dual wield maces my atk drops to
about 500 or 600, now the question I have is, when you equip one mace with a
lower dly than you fists is it like monsters where you dly matches the
weapons, so my fist go faster or is it that I have to separate delays?

-----Original Message-----
From: Lombard.Mikhael [mailto:Mikhael_Lombard@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 8:33 AM
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Patch day is this wednesday!


From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>

What will they proc, did they tell you. I am interested in knowing that, and
if it is true then woohoo!

-----Original Message-----
From: imari_dellimore@... [mailto:imari_dellimore@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 8:21 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Patch day is this wednesday!


From: imari_dellimore@...

I am told that Patch day is this wednesday and with it will come HASTE for
monks
aswell as afew other enhancements (some still being kept secret) I am also
told
that the treant fists will gain a Proc in this patch. Anyone got any word
on
that or was I just being fed a baseless rumor?

Personnally I am looking forward to the enhancements and have already
started
camping for my treant fist items.
